        Constructor
        Parameters:
        args - The shell command args
        sFolder - The folderName in data/ (expects to find file named data/sFolder/config/sFolder.properties
        sEnv - The java class of the environment
        envConstructorParameters - An object list of constructor parametsr
        plottingStyle - The plotting style
        Throws:
        Exception - The exception

      • setupReinforceParmeters

        public void setupReinforceParmeters(double initMean,
                                    double minMean,
                                    double maxMean,
                                    double initSD,
                                    double minSD,
                                    double maxSD)
        Setup a policy having the parameter adapted by REINFORCE
        Parameters:
        initMean - The initial mean
        minMean - The minimum mean
        maxMean - The maximum mean
        initSD - The initial standard deviation
        minSD - The minimum standard deviation
        maxSD - The maximum standard deviation

      • setupExperiment

        public void setupExperiment(int maxSteps,
                            int maxEpisodes,
                            int maxExperiments,
                            double gamma,
                            double[] alphas,
                            boolean stochasticRewards)
        setup the learner from hand
        Parameters:
        maxSteps - The maximum number of steps
        maxEpisodes - The maximum number of episodes
        maxExperiments - The maximum number of experiments
        gamma - The discounting rate
        alphas - An array of step-size parameters for learning the Q-function
        stochasticRewards - A flag indicating if stochastic rewards are used
